placements.disclaimer: Your card will be immediately charged a $<%immediate_price%> fee, plus any applicable sales tax for your Experian membership.
placements.taxFreeTermsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium. Your credit card will be charged $<%immediate_price%> today and each year you continue your membership. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. Cancellations taking place within your first <%money_back_days%> days of membership or within the first <%money_back_days%> days after your annual membership renewal are eligible for a full refund of that year's paid membership fee. All cancellations taking place more than <%money_back_days%> days after you make any annual membership fee payment are not eligible for a full or pro-rated refund of that year's paid membership fee.
